Thanks for contributing to Multiflex Core!

Before submitting:
- Provide a clear rationale for the change and what problem it solves.
- Keep PRs focused and easy to review.
- Add tests where applicable.
- For security issues, please use the process described in SECURITY.md (do not open public issues).

If your change affects consensus, networking, wallet logic, or other sensitive areas, please include additional context and test coverage.
-->
